archived.description: Indicates whether the template is archived or not.

archivedAt.description: Date and time when the template was archived.

bccRecipients.description: List of BCC recipients for the template.

bodyHtml.description: HTML content of the email template body.

bodyText.description: Plain text content of the email template body.

bounceCount.description: Count of bounced emails related to this template.

ccRecipients.description: List of CC recipients for the template.

clickCount.description: Count of clicks on links in emails sent using this template.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the template was created.

deliverCount.description: Count of successfully delivered emails using this template.

failureCount.description: Count of failed email deliveries related to this template.

lastUsedAt.description: Date and time when the template was last used in an email.

negativeReplyCount.description: Count of negative replies received for emails sent using this template.

neutralReplyCount.description: Count of neutral replies received for emails sent using this template.

openCount.description: Count of opened emails related to this template.

optOutCount.description: Count of recipients who opted out of receiving emails using this template.

positiveReplyCount.description: Count of positive replies received for emails sent using this template.

replyCount.description: Total count of replies received for emails sent using this template.

scheduleCount.description: Count of scheduled email deliveries using this template.

shareType.description: Indicates the sharing permissions for the template.

subject.description: Subject line of the email template.

toRecipients.description: List of TO recipients for the template.

trackLinks.description: Flag to track link clicks in emails sent using this template.

trackOpens.description: Flag to track email opens for emails sent using this template.

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the template was last updated.

contentCategoryMemberships.description: List of content categories associated with the template.

recipients.description: List of email recipients for the template.

sequenceTemplates.description: List of sequence templates associated with this template.

updater.description: Updater who last modified the template.
